ComicInfo.Tags: Uncle Percy,Rudy Raccoon,Rollo Raccoon,Skinny Fox,Bo Bunny,Mugsy Mole,Raccoon Kids
ComicInfo.Title: A Good Skate!; Double Trouble!; Food for Thought!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Muggsy brags about his terrific roller skating but when the boys try to prove he can't skate, incredible luck works in Muggsy's favor.
Skinny tries to drive a hard bargain but nothing works out for him.
The boys' cowboy-and-Indian game is too noisy, so Uncle Percy tries separating them but that only leads to more trouble.
Hare tries to pawn off a pair of ice skates he won (in the summer) to Tortoise.
The boys and Muggsy try to figure out how they can get dinner when they only have a penny between them.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Otto Feuer,Sheldon Mayer,Rube Grossman,Otto Feuer,Sheldon Mayer,Rube Grossman
ComicInfo.Inker: Otto Feuer,Sheldon Mayer,Rube Grossman,Otto Feuer,Sheldon Mayer,Rube Grossman
